title: Diamond Vaddanam with Emerald Accents: A Regal Waist Belt
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold and encrusted with brilliant-cut Diamonds and two pear-shaped Rubies totaling 4.52 carats. Features two emeralds totaling 6.01 carats
enhancing the design. Finished with a smooth Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning Vaddanam showcases a traditional design with intricate floral and paisley motifs. The diamonds are meticulously pave-set to maximize brilliance. Emeralds add a regal touch to the design. It features a secure and adjustable clasp for comfortable wear. The design is reminiscent of classic temple jewelry, lending it an heirloom quality.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) with vibrant green (emeralds) and the warm yellow of 22K gold. A timeless color palette that exudes sophistication.
occasions: or half-saree functions (langa voni). Also suitable for grand receptions and cultural events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Vaddanam is a true testament to South Indian artistry. Its exquisite craftsmanship, combined with the brilliance of diamonds and the allure of emeralds, makes it a valuable heirloom piece. The classic design ensures it will remain a timeless treasure for generations. It's an investment in both beauty and cultural heritage, offering both security and traditional elegance.
